Get a Class¶

A class is where the definition of the data structure resides.

In this service, we can get a class defined in some context.

Basic usage

$ curl -s 'http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/City/_schema'

{
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#", 
    "@context": {
        "@language": "pt"
    }, 
    "description": "Lugar perene e urbanizado onde pessoas habitam.", 
    "id": "place:City", 
    "links": [
        {
            "href": "{+_base_url}", 
            "method": "GET", 
            "rel": "self"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/City/_schema", 
            "method": "GET", 
            "rel": "class"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/City/?class_prefix=http://semantica.globo.com/place/", 
            "method": "GET", 
            "rel": "collection"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/City/{_resource_id}", 
            "method": "DELETE", 
            "rel": "delete"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/City/{_resource_id}", 
            "method": "PUT", 
            "rel": "update", 
            "schema": {
                "$ref": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/City/_schema"
            }
        }
    ], 
    "properties": {
        "place:geonameId": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "datatype": "xsd:integer", 
            "description": "ID para uso da API do Geonames.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "title": "ID no Geoname", 
            "type": "integer"
        }, 
        "place:hasSubRegion": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "description": "Um lugar pode ser subdividido em regi\u00f5es.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "items": {
                "format": "uri", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "range": {
                "@id": "place:Region", 
                "format": "uri", 
                "graph": "place:", 
                "title": "Regi\u00e3o", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "title": "Tem sub-regi\u00e3o", 
            "type": "array"
        }, 
        "place:latitude": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "datatype": "xsd:float", 
            "description": "Coordenada de latitude de acordo com WGS84.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "title": "Latitude", 
            "type": "number"
        }, 
        "place:longitude": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "datatype": "xsd:float", 
            "description": "Coordenada de longitude de acordo com WGS84.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "title": "Longitude", 
            "type": "number"
        }, 
        "place:partOfState": {
            "class": "place:City", 
            "description": "Cidade est\u00e1 no estado.", 
            "format": "uri", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "range": {
                "@id": "place:State", 
                "format": "uri", 
                "graph": "place:", 
                "title": "Estado", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "title": "Faz parte do estado", 
            "type": "string"
        }, 
        "upper:description": {
            "class": "upper:Entity", 
            "datatype": "xsd:string", 
            "description": "Descri\u00e7\u00e3o textual da entidade.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "title": "Descri\u00e7\u00e3o", 
            "type": "string"
        }, 
        "upper:fullName": {
            "class": "upper:Substance", 
            "datatype": "xsd:string", 
            "description": "Nome completo de Agente ou Objeto.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "title": "Nome Completo", 
            "type": "string"
        }, 
        "upper:name": {
            "class": "upper:Entity", 
            "datatype": "xsd:string", 
            "description": "Nomes populares de uma inst\u00e2ncia. Exemplo: nomes pelo quais uma pessoa \u00e9 conhecida (e.g. Ronaldinho, Zico, Lula). N\u00e3o confundir com nome completo, uma outra propriedade com valor \u00fanico e formal.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "required": true, 
            "title": "Nome", 
            "type": "string"
        }, 
        "upper:sociallyRelatedWith": {
            "class": "upper:Substance", 
            "description": "Rela\u00e7\u00e3o social abstrata entre qualquer combina\u00e7\u00e3o de (Agente, Objeto) tomados dois-a-dois.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "items": {
                "format": "uri", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "range": {
                "@id": "upper:Substance", 
                "format": "uri", 
                "graph": "upper:", 
                "title": "Subst\u00e2ncia", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "title": "Socialmente relacionado a", 
            "type": "array"
        }
    }, 
    "title": "Cidade", 
    "type": "object"
}

Why _schema? In our data model we have a clear distinction between class (structure of data) and instances (the data content itself), and by using a request like GET <context>/<class> we could not have a clear distinction whether we want the whole collection of instances or we want the definition of this class.

Thus, the _schema suffix is used to distinguish the latter case from the former. It also serves to inform that the class definition will be given in json-schema format.

Optional parameters¶

lang: Specify language of labels. Options: pt, en, undefined (do not filter labels)

expand_uri: The URIs that represent names and values of properties in the response are either compressed (0) or expanded (1) by this parameter.

By default, this parameter is set to 0, meaning that URIs are compressed for keys and values.

This is going to change in future versions, and the default will be URI expansion. So, we ask you to use this parameter explicitly and not rely on the default behaviour.

For example, rdfs:label is the compressed form, while http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label is the respective expanded form.

Warning

For the time being, URI expansion is not supported in resource listings. It is only supported while retrieving instances and class definition.

graph_uri: Set the graph URI, for cases where the URI is not like http://semantica.globo.com/CONTEXT_NAME

class_uri: Set the class URI, for cases where the URI is not like http://semantica.globo.com/CONTEXT_NAME/CLASS_NAME

class_prefix: by default, the class URI is defined by the API’s convention (context_uri/class_name). If the convention doesn’t apply, provide class_prefix so the URI will be: class_prefix/class_name. Example:

'http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/City/?class_prefix=http%3A//dbpedia.org/'

If no class_prefix had been provided, the class URI above would be resolved as: http://semantica.globo.com/place/City. As class_prefix was defined, the class URI will be: http://dbpedia.org/City.

Possible responses¶

Status 200

If the class exists, the response body is a JSON representing the class definition.

$ curl -s 'http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/Country/_schema'

{
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#", 
    "@context": {
        "@language": "pt"
    }, 
    "description": "Sub-divis\u00e3o pol\u00edtica do Mundo.", 
    "id": "place:Country", 
    "links": [
        {
            "href": "{+_base_url}", 
            "method": "GET", 
            "rel": "self"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/Country/_schema", 
            "method": "GET", 
            "rel": "class"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/Country/?class_prefix=http://semantica.globo.com/place/", 
            "method": "GET", 
            "rel": "collection"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/Country/{_resource_id}", 
            "method": "DELETE", 
            "rel": "delete"
        }, 
        {
            "href": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/Country/{_resource_id}", 
            "method": "PUT", 
            "rel": "update", 
            "schema": {
                "$ref": "http://brainiak.semantica.dev.globoi.com/place/Country/_schema"
            }
        }
    ], 
    "properties": {
        "place:geonameId": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "datatype": "xsd:integer", 
            "description": "ID para uso da API do Geonames.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "title": "ID no Geoname", 
            "type": "integer"
        }, 
        "place:hasSubRegion": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "description": "Um lugar pode ser subdividido em regi\u00f5es.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "items": {
                "format": "uri", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "range": {
                "@id": "place:Region", 
                "format": "uri", 
                "graph": "place:", 
                "title": "Regi\u00e3o", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "title": "Tem sub-regi\u00e3o", 
            "type": "array"
        }, 
        "place:latitude": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "datatype": "xsd:float", 
            "description": "Coordenada de latitude de acordo com WGS84.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "title": "Latitude", 
            "type": "number"
        }, 
        "place:longitude": {
            "class": "place:Place", 
            "datatype": "xsd:float", 
            "description": "Coordenada de longitude de acordo com WGS84.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "title": "Longitude", 
            "type": "number"
        }, 
        "place:partOfContinent": {
            "class": "place:Country", 
            "description": "Pa\u00eds est\u00e1 no contiente.", 
            "graph": "place:", 
            "items": {
                "format": "uri", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "range": {
                "@id": "place:Continent", 
                "format": "uri", 
                "graph": "place:", 
                "title": "Continente", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "title": "Faz parte do continente", 
            "type": "array"
        }, 
        "upper:description": {
            "class": "upper:Entity", 
            "datatype": "xsd:string", 
            "description": "Descri\u00e7\u00e3o textual da entidade.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "title": "Descri\u00e7\u00e3o", 
            "type": "string"
        }, 
        "upper:fullName": {
            "class": "upper:Substance", 
            "datatype": "xsd:string", 
            "description": "Nome completo de Agente ou Objeto.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "title": "Nome Completo", 
            "type": "string"
        }, 
        "upper:name": {
            "class": "upper:Entity", 
            "datatype": "xsd:string", 
            "description": "Nomes populares de uma inst\u00e2ncia. Exemplo: nomes pelo quais uma pessoa \u00e9 conhecida (e.g. Ronaldinho, Zico, Lula). N\u00e3o confundir com nome completo, uma outra propriedade com valor \u00fanico e formal.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "required": true, 
            "title": "Nome", 
            "type": "string"
        }, 
        "upper:sociallyRelatedWith": {
            "class": "upper:Substance", 
            "description": "Rela\u00e7\u00e3o social abstrata entre qualquer combina\u00e7\u00e3o de (Agente, Objeto) tomados dois-a-dois.", 
            "graph": "upper:", 
            "items": {
                "format": "uri", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "range": {
                "@id": "upper:Substance", 
                "format": "uri", 
                "graph": "upper:", 
                "title": "Subst\u00e2ncia", 
                "type": "string"
            }, 
            "title": "Socialmente relacionado a", 
            "type": "array"
        }
    }, 
    "title": "Pa\u00eds", 
    "type": "object"
}

Status 400

If there are unknown parameters in the request, the response is a 400 with a JSON informing the wrong parameters and the accepted ones.

{
    "errors": ["HTTP error: 400\nArgument 'wrong_param' is not supported"]
}

Status 404

If the class does not exist, the response is a 404 with a JSON informing the error

{
    "errors": ["HTTP error: 404\nClass not found in triplestore."]
}
